issue_title: [Enhancement] Add optional logging for storage operations

test_coverage.rationale: 7 comprehensive tests covering all acceptance criteria: logging enabled/disabled states, path/count inclusion, empty file handling, timing info

minimal_change.rationale: Minimal changes to storage.py: added logging module import, helper function, and debug logging in load/save methods. No breaking changes.

acceptance_criteria.rationale: All acceptance criteria met: FLYWHEEL_DEBUG=1 enables logging, logs include file path, operation type, record count, and timing

code_quality.rationale: Code follows project conventions, passes ruff linter, uses consistent formatting with existing code

risk_assessment.rationale: Low risk: logging is optional (opt-in via env var), no changes to core functionality, all existing tests still pass

summary: Implemented optional logging for storage operations via FLYWHEEL_DEBUG=1 environment variable. Logs include file path, operation type (load/save), record count, and elapsed time in milliseconds.
